SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthDAO
Retrieves Authtoken data from the server.
AuthToken
An authtoken.
ClearResponse
Returns a response from the server.
ClearService
Clears the database.
CreateGameRequest
Sends a request to the server with a request to create a game with the specified name.
CreateGameResponse
Returns a response from the server.
CreateGameService
Creates a new game.
DataAccessException
Indicates there was an error connecting to the database
Game
A chess game.
GameDAO
Does CRUD operations on a game.
JoinGameRequest
Sends a request to the server to join a game (specified by the ID) as a certain color
JoinGameResponse
Returns a response from the server.
JoinGameService
Verifies that the specified game exists, and, if a color is specified, adds the caller as the requested color to the game.
ListGameResponse
Returns a result from the server.
ListGamesService
Gives a list of all games.
LoginRequest
Sends a request to the server to generate an authtoken based on the submitted credentials (username and password).
LoginResponse
Returns a response from the server.
LoginService
Logs in an existing user (returns a new authToken).
LogoutResponse
Returns a response from the server.
LogoutService
Logs out the user represented by the authToken.
RegisterRequest
Sends a request to the server to create a new user with the specified username, password, and email.
RegisterResponse
Returns a response from the server.
RegisterService
Register a new user.
User
A user.
UserDAO
Does CRUD operations on users.
